root.name: Caveman Ugh-Lympics
root.description: Caveman Ugh-lympics was released in 1988 for the Commodore 64, DOS and the Nintendo Entertainment system. Data East renamed the NES version Caveman Games.Caveman Ugh-lympics is set in the Stone age, where you must partake in various Olympic events.Events-The Sabre-race : Players must jump and avoid obstacles on the race track, while being chased by a Sabre-tooth.-Mate-toss : The player must throw their wife or husband as far as they can.-Clubbing : You and another person/AI start on a cliff with clubs, the first person to knock the other off wins.-Dino- vault : The player must pole-vault over a Tyrannosaurus Rex.-Fire-making : The player must race against the opponent to start a fire.-Dino-race : The player rides a dinosaur along an obstacle course, avoiding hazards. Quickest time wins.
